results.name: a(n) = 2^(n-1)*Fibonacci(n-3), n >= 0.
comment: This sequence gives the elements M^n(2, 2) of the matrix M = [[3, 1], [1, -1]].

Motivation to look into these matrix powers came from A319053. M^n[1, 1] = A063782 and M^n(1, 2) =  M^n(2, 1) = A085449(n). Proof by Cayley-Hamilton, using S(n, -I) = (-I)^n*F(n+1), and S(n, x) from A049310 and F = A000045.
For a similar signed sequence see A087205.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,4).
formula: a(n) = 2^(n-1)*(phi^(n-3) - (1 - phi)^(n-3))/(2*phi - 1) with the golden section phi =  A001622.
